title: [HOLD for payment 2023-08-21] [$1000] Web - Close account button moves up when offline
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to Settings
2. Go to Security
3. Go to Close account
4. Turn off internet connectivity
5. Observe that the 'Close account' button moves up

Expected result: The 'Close account' button should not move up

Actual result: None
